snippet: The I.R.S. warns taxpayers to beware of fraudulent e-mails purporting to be from the agency, which doesn't begin communication via e-mail.
abstract: The I.R.S. warns taxpayers to beware of fraudulent e-mails purporting to be from the agency, which doesn't begin communication via e-mail.

headline.main: Taxpayers Warned to Beware of E-Mails From I.R.S.
